mapper.sql: ID as id, CODE as code, SHOP_ID as shopId, MQ_SO_LOG_ID as mqSoLogId, SOURCE_MSG as sourceMsg
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_so_platform_so_log ( id, CODE , SHOP_ID , MQ_SO_LOG_ID , SOURCE_MSG ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{code,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{shopId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{mqSoLogId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{sourceMsg,javaType=String,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
